title: Strange yet strangely intriguing
review: It's a weird concept no doubt, and the film never admits this. But as weird as it was, I found myself captivated. That is after all the goal of cinema.

title: Rocky beginning, but ultimatley powerful
review: While oddly paced and a bit clich√© in the beginning as Mercury is shown rising into fame (it almost feels like a non-engaging re-enacted documentary), the film develops towards the halfway point, ultimately telling a story that is incredibly powerful.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: A spectacular film
review: I don't think it's perfect, but I do think it's beautiful... even magical

title: Exciting
review: Thought the film largely resembles the first, it sets itself apart by using the arena in a new way. Maybe it lost speed in the middle, but more than made up for it towards the end. It exciting.
